channel.title: And ill quit r-s
channel.description: add a thanks / give cookies button

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:19, topic:413601”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=515100.msg3741397#msg3741397 date=1315378839]
If we remove rep and replace it with a post-by-post thanks system, I’d be game for that. I don’t think ‘thanks’ should be visible on the profile though, that way there’s no real incentive to abuse it.
[/quote]

I agree with this. I sorta thought up an idea for writing a thanks mod where each post could be thanked, and then could be viewed in the profile with statistics such as thanks per section, per category, etc. For this particular community, those stats would be invisible to the public community, and could instead be used by staff members to accurately track members of the community.

Could take this even far enough to require a comment of thanks, so that the user can read what other people have to say to them. This would remain private to the user who received the thanks, and any additional members given access (such as staff members).

Just a developed thought. :P[/quote]
Should really push for this…

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:50, topic:413601”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=515100.msg3744997#msg3744997 date=1315675292]

So in MITB people don’t abuse rep like they do in here?

rep actualy means something there i only have 25 rep there lol
[/quote]
Not totally…
I see people get rep for sarcastic/clever comments, and I got de repped for posting a model made in metaseq.[/quote]

still better than on moparscape lol

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:48, topic:413601”]I do agree this community is very boring as far as member individualism goes… everyone is a senior member, nobody is allowed an avatar, nobody is allowed images in their signatures…

But im aware it was removed because people we abusing it, but i find it unfair that a few members who abused the system ruined it for the lot of us[/quote]

I agree, this community is very dull nowadays. I’ve seen funerals with a more exciting atmosphere than this community sometimes.

New features aren’t bad as long as we don’t go over the top.

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I do agree this community is very boring as far as member individualism goes… everyone is a senior member, nobody is allowed an avatar, nobody is allowed images in their signatures…

But im aware it was removed because people we abusing it, but i find it unfair that a few members who abused the system ruined it for the lot of us

@andrew, ive seen more examples of what you stated on moparscape than i have at rune server, also god forbid you do it over at mitb, sarcastic barrage is a good phrase.

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

iz3 legend:

This is moparscape where creativity and ideas are not allowed.

I don’t understand what you mean by that. I’m completely open to suggestions. I’m planning changes for this community and can’t really know what to change without your input.

The Reaper X:

Lame stuff is lame… Dude, all you need is your name. If people know you by your name then you’re popular. Why would you want to march around the forum with a certificate saying “HEY LOOK AT ME I HAVE A BUNCH OF POINTS THAT A BUNCH OF LAMES GAVE ME FOR MAKING A POST THAT MEANT NEAR NOTHING”.

Private points give no reason for giving away points without cause. The system would work hella better.

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:29, topic:413601”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=515100.msg3744750#msg3744750 date=1315666667]

I don’t see Rune -server in the name ’ MoparScape’? Why should we be like them? This just beings more dumb ass people to ruin the community.

There’s also x2 people on r-s than this atm

So we should add
1: A horrible community
2: Signatures for everybody!1!!
3: Avatars too ofc
4: Tons of server advertisements on every page
and then we will be the exact same as r-s!!

r-s is perfect, except for the staff
[/quote]
I disagree, I made an account there with the same name as this one and the first response I got to a honest question that was non nooby and made to see how the community reacts in the help section was “MY DICK”. Then the next 9 people quoted it along with the mod that locked the topic.[/quote]
Rofl.

I got banned forever for barely flaming some retards that don’t know how to make a command…

Read full topic

item.title: And ill quit r-s
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I’m talking about the R-S ones.

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:34, topic:413601”]“First model on the page”

Demonicgsword3.png341×925

Yes this is TOTALLY a recolor. SARCASM[/quote]
It’s not a recolor, but it’s from a kid who traced it, claimed the concept was completely his, and flipped out completely when everyone kept proving him wrong, and stuck to the "NO I MADE THIS, IT WAS JUST COINCIDENCE THAT THE SWORDS YOU FOUND NAMED “demon sword” LOOK LIKE MY DEMON SWORDS

Read full topic
